definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to pay attention/to take notice of/to care for
without giving due consideration/to ignore/to overlook

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作为个人，对这种人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: We closed our ears to their complaints.
sentences.chinese: 我们不理睬他们的牢骚。

sentences.english: He did ignor what I suggeted to him.
sentences.chinese: 他根本不理睬我对他的暗示。

sentences.english: I am enough of a german to give them to go-by .
sentences.chinese: 我是德国人，我可不愿理睬他们。

sentences.english: The proposal fell upon deaf ears.
She put her dreams by for a while.
sentences.chinese: 她把梦想放在一边，不予理睬。

sentences.english: Did you do this and the boss ignored you?
sentences.chinese: 你这样做了，不过老板没有理睬吗？

sentences.english: She looked me straight through when I greeted her.
sentences.chinese: 我跟她打招呼时她故意不理睬我。

sentences.english: Tina gave John the brush-off and refused to go to the concert with him.
sentences.chinese: 蒂娜不理睬约翰并拒绝同他一参加间乐会。

sentences.english: She decided to ignore the petty anti-feminist remarks.
sentences.chinese: 她决定不去理睬那些攻击女权运动的闲言碎语。

sentences.english: I'm not going to dignify his comments by reacting to them.
sentences.chinese: 我才不会理睬他的评论以抬高他的身价。

sentences.english: The Parlement of Paris itself decided to snub the marriage ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎最高法院自行决定对婚礼庆典不予理睬。

sentences.english: The suggestion of his fell upon deaf ears.
sentences.chinese: 他的这项建议没有人理睬。
但是，他们对他毫不理睬。

sentences.english: She breezed out without paying attention to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 她不理睬任何人，飘然而去。

sentences.english: Ying-Ying He can not ignore, the more the more sad cry.
sentences.chinese: 可盈盈却不理睬他，愈哭愈伤心。

definition: to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to acknowledge/to respond/to answer/to pay attention/to heed/to deal with
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
to turn a blind eye to
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond
to pay attention/to take notice of/to care for
to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear
